Sentencas: One of the essential components for ensuring the long service life of solid oxide cell (SOC) stacks is the sealant used.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of fracture processes in glass-ceramic sealant by means of acoustic emission

Sentencas: Therefore, in this work, an experimental investigation of the glass ceramic sealant (GCS) fracture process was carried out using an Acoustic Emission (AE) based approach.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of fracture processes in glass-ceramic sealant by means of acoustic emission

Sentencas: A series of tensile tests at room temperature were performed and the acoustic activity emitted was recorded by two AE sensors.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of fracture processes in glass-ceramic sealant by means of acoustic emission

Sentencas: An AE signal analysis was then performed using two approaches: wave mode identification and frequency content analysis.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of fracture processes in glass-ceramic sealant by means of acoustic emission

Sentencas: To understand the fracture process of the GCS, the analysis was supported with prior knowledge of the GCS microstructure and a post-test visual analysis.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of fracture processes in glass-ceramic sealant by means of acoustic emission

Sentencas: This demonstrated the presence of low-frequency failure mechanisms (50-400 kHz) such as debonding, fiber pull-out and matrix cracking, and high-frequency mechanisms (>400 kHz) such as fiber breakage.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of fracture processes in glass-ceramic sealant by means of acoustic emission

Sentencas: The results confirm the suitability of using the acoustic emission approach for monitoring failure events and show its potential application in SOC stacks monitoring.
Titulo: An experimental investigation of fracture processes in glass-ceramic sealant by means of acoustic emission
